title: Magic Mirror
detail: Ask your mirror to try on makeup looks for you
extended_details: Ever want to try on a makeup look but don't have the energy to pull out all your make up and put it all on for a look that might not even work and will be a pain to take off?  Magic mirror is the solution to your problem!  A mirror that will project makeup styles onto your reflection.  endless possibilities at your fingertips.  No pile of makeup wipes, smeared eyes, dry skin, products scattering your bathroom.
